item.title: All three aligned today - miracle
item.description: Those rare days when hair, makeup, and outfit all hit at once.

media:content.media:title: All three aligned today - miracle
media:content.media:description: Those rare days when hair, makeup, and outfit all hit at once.

item.title: Why hang with my ex? good for you though
item.description: Responding with savage calm when someone judges my choices - classic me.

item.title: If it’s Target, I’m already in the car
item.description: When my bestie calls about Target runs, it’s never a maybe.

item.title: Everyone from high school having babies??
item.description: Scrolling through stories like - how is everyone suddenly a parent?

item.title: Thought I was slick till mom hit sprint mode
item.description: Trying to sneak out quietly, but mom’s faster than I expected.

item.title: She keeps stealing my stuff
item.description: Playfully calling out my bestie for always “borrowing” my clothes.

item.title: I knew I wasn’t weak
item.description: When you cry over nothing, then get your period and instantly feel validated.

item.title: Some things are just good for the soul
item.description: Living by the rule that dancing in the rain will always be worth it.

item.title: Golden hour always wins
item.description: Showing why golden hour light makes every photo and video pure magic.

item.title: Bestie taking forever to unlock the car
item.description: A funny winter moment- freezing while my friend fumbles with the keys.

item.title: Can we bring this trend back already
item.description: A nostalgic nod to one of my favorite past trends.

item.title: My dad acts like he’s in Fast & Furious when I drive
item.description: POV: Your dad thinks every turn you make behind the wheel is a near-death experience.

item.title: Yelling at my brother then realizing mom’s home
item.description: That awkward moment when you forget your mom’s home mid-rant.

item.title: He said “wish you were here” … I’m already in the closet
item.description: A playful take on surprise visits- literally already in his closet waiting.

item.title: Not the ex calling from jail
item.description: Storytime about that one wild night my boyfriend’s ex decided to call him… from jail.

item.title: Every time he says baby… instant melt
item.description: A sweet reaction moment - I hear “baby” and suddenly everything’s better.

item.title: Gaining the sister’s approval like a pro
item.description: Trying to form an alliance with my boyfriend’s sister - priorities, right?

item.title: I’m chilling, she’s causing waves
item.description: That one friend who can’t just relax by the pool - and I love her for it.

item.title: You’ll never find a girl like me… or my squad
item.description: That moment when your friend group walks in and proves we all shine the same way.

item.title: Protect your peace, always
item.description: A reminder to stay grounded - not everyone’s opinion deserves space in your mind.
